__e: In five minutes, they'd have been dead.
Or maybe both of them were dead.
They don't actually hit each other... otherwise one or the other would be dead... and that's against the law.
Oh, I didn't know you two were still here.
I know this much, that these two boys wouldn't be here if it wasn't for me.
If not for you they wouldn't be here.
But if it takes a little longer than we figure... I want to know if you and your associates... would be in a position to sort of tide us over.
- Thought they weren't gonna be home.
The people would be up in arms.
You'd still be in jail if that guy hadn't given me that $50.
No, I would be 12 years then, and they would be in their 80s.

(Carolyn) I STARTED TO EXAMINE THE FILM, LOOKING AT ALL THE THINGS THAT I KNEW WOULD BE THERE--
- Well, they'd be down at the recorder's office.
